scripts.wipe: linklocal list -r | bulk -c 'rm -rf node_modules' 2>&1; rm -rf node_modules
scripts.fresh_install: npm run wipe && npm run full_install
scripts.full_install: npm i linklocal bulk && npm run link_install && npm i
scripts.link_install: linklocal link -r && linklocal list -r --unique | bulk -c 'npm i'
